description: Enterprise techniques used by cmd, ATT&CK software S0106 (v1.2)
name: cmd (S0106)

techniques.comment: [cmd](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0106) is used to execute programs and other actions at the command-line interface.(Citation: TechNet Cmd)
[cmd](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0106) can be used to find files and directories with native functionality such as dir commands.(Citation: TechNet Dir)
[cmd](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0106) can be used to delete files from the file system.(Citation: TechNet Del)
[cmd](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0106) can be used to copy files to/from a remotely connected external system.(Citation: TechNet Copy)
[cmd](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0106) can be used to copy files to/from a remotely connected internal system.(Citation: TechNet Copy)
[cmd](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0106) can be used to find information about the operating system.(Citation: TechNet Dir)
